languages.text: {n}Эдельтрад вторит смеху Теодоры.{/n} "Расставаться с данной властью значит приглашать разгул ереси и опасного свободомыслия в свое окружение. Судя по лени в мышлении, ты, {name}, наверняка уже допустил{mf||а} это в своем домене".

traits.locale_text: {n}Эдельтрад вторит смеху Теодоры.{/n} "Расставаться с данной властью значит приглашать разгул ереси и опасного свободомыслия в свое окружение. Судя по лени в мышлении, ты, {name}, наверняка уже допустил{mf||а} это в своем домене".

languages.text: {n}Edelthrad echoes Theodora's laugh.{/n} "Relinquishing authority is tantamount to inviting rampant heresy and dangerous freethinking into your midst. Judging by your lackadaisical mindset, {name}, I would wager that such a fate has already befallen your domain."
languages.original_text: {n}Эдельтрад вторит смеху Теодоры.{/n} "Расставаться с данной властью значит приглашать разгул ереси и опасного свободомыслия в свое окружение. Судя по лени в мышлении, ты, {name}, наверняка уже допустил{mf||а} это в своем домене".

traits.locale_text: {n}Edelthrad echoes Theodora's laugh.{/n} "Relinquishing authority is tantamount to inviting rampant heresy and dangerous freethinking into your midst. Judging by your lackadaisical mindset, {name}, I would wager that such a fate has already befallen your domain."

{n}Edelthrad echoes Theodora's laugh.{/n} "Relinquishing authority is tantamount to inviting rampant heresy and dangerous freethinking into your midst. Judging by your lackadaisical mindset, {name}, I would wager that such a fate has already befallen your domain."

{n}Edelthrad echoes Theodora's laugh.{/n} "Relinquishing authority is tantamount to inviting rampant heresy and dangerous freethinking into your midst. Judging by your lackadaisical mindset, {name}, I would wager that such a fate has already befallen your domain."

{n}Edelthrad echoes Theodora's laugh.{/n} "Relinquishing authority is tantamount to inviting rampant heresy and dangerous freethinking into your midst. Judging by your lackadaisical mindset, {name}, I would wager that such a fate has already befallen your domain."

{n}Edelthrad echoes Theodora's laugh.{/n} "Relinquishing authority is tantamount to inviting rampant heresy and dangerous freethinking into your midst. Judging by your lackadaisical mindset, {name}, I would wager that such a fate has already befallen your domain."

languages.text: {n}艾德萨德附和着西奥多拉的笑声。{/n}“放弃权力就等于引狼入室，等于邀请猖獗的异端分子与危险的自由思想渗透到你们之中。从你这毫无责任感的发言来看，{name}，我敢打赌，你麾下的领地恐怕已经落得了这样的下场。”
languages.original_text: {n}Edelthrad echoes Theodora's laugh.{/n} "Relinquishing authority is tantamount to inviting rampant heresy and dangerous freethinking into your midst. Judging by your lackadaisical mindset, {name}, I would wager that such a fate has already befallen your domain."

traits.locale_text: {n}艾德萨德附和着西奥多拉的笑声。{/n}“放弃权力就等于引狼入室，等于邀请猖獗的异端分子与危险的自由思想渗透到你们之中。从你这毫无责任感的发言来看，{name}，我敢打赌，你麾下的领地恐怕已经落得了这样的下场。”

languages.text: {n}Edelthrad se hace eco de la risa de Theodora.{/n} «Ceder la autoridad es prácticamente invitar la herejía y un librepensamiento peligroso. A juzgar por su talante despreocupado, {name}, imagino que es algo que ya sucede en sus dominios».
languages.original_text: {n}Edelthrad echoes Theodora's laugh.{/n} "Relinquishing authority is tantamount to inviting rampant heresy and dangerous freethinking into your midst. Judging by your lackadaisical mindset, {name}, I would wager that such a fate has already befallen your domain."

traits.locale_text: {n}Edelthrad se hace eco de la risa de Theodora.{/n} «Ceder la autoridad es prácticamente invitar la herejía y un librepensamiento peligroso. A juzgar por su talante despreocupado, {name}, imagino que es algo que ya sucede en sus dominios».

languages.text: {n}エデルスラドもシオドーラにつられて笑う。{/n}「権威を手放すということは、はびこる異端と危険な自由思想を招き入れるのと同じだ。{name}の怠けた考え方から判断すると、そうした運命がすでにあなたの領域に降りかかっていることだろう」
languages.original_text: {n}Edelthrad echoes Theodora's laugh.{/n} "Relinquishing authority is tantamount to inviting rampant heresy and dangerous freethinking into your midst. Judging by your lackadaisical mindset, {name}, I would wager that such a fate has already befallen your domain."

traits.locale_text: {n}エデルスラドもテオドラにつられて笑う。{/n}「権威を手放すということは、はびこる異端と危険な自由思想を自分の中に招き入れるのと同じだ。あなたの怠けた考え方から判断すると、{name}、そうした運命がすでにあなたの領域に降りかかっていると賭けてもいい」
{n}エデルスラドもシオドーラにつられて笑う。{/n}「権威を手放すということは、はびこる異端と危険な自由思想を招き入れるのと同じだ。{name}の怠けた考え方から判断すると、そうした運命がすでにあなたの領域に降りかかっていることだろう」

languages.text: {n}Edelthrad rit à son tour.{/n} « Le fait de renoncer à son autorité revient à inviter l'hérésie et la libre-pensée à se répandre autour de soi. À en juger par votre nonchalance, {name}, j'imagine que tel est déjà le cas dans votre entourage. »
languages.original_text: {n}Edelthrad echoes Theodora's laugh.{/n} "Relinquishing authority is tantamount to inviting rampant heresy and dangerous freethinking into your midst. Judging by your lackadaisical mindset, {name}, I would wager that such a fate has already befallen your domain."

traits.locale_text: {n}Edelthrad rit à son tour.{/n} « Le fait de renoncer à son autorité revient à inviter l'hérésie et la libre-pensée à se répandre autour de soi. À en juger par votre nonchalance, {name}, j'imagine que tel est déjà le cas dans votre entourage. »

languages.text: {n}Edelthrads Lachen ahmt Theodoras nach.{/n} "Auf Autorität zu verzichten heißt, zügellose Ketzerei und gefährliches Freidenkertum in Eure Mitte einzuladen. Euer nachlässiges Denken lässt vermuten, {name}, und ich möchte fast darauf wetten, dass dieses Schicksal Euer Reich bereits erfasst hat."
languages.original_text: {n}Edelthrad echoes Theodora's laugh.{/n} "Relinquishing authority is tantamount to inviting rampant heresy and dangerous freethinking into your midst. Judging by your lackadaisical mindset, {name}, I would wager that such a fate has already befallen your domain."

traits.locale_text: {n}Edelthrads Lachen ahmt Theodoras nach.{/n} "Auf Autorität zu verzichten heißt, zügellose Ketzerei und gefährliches Freidenkertum in Eure Mitte einzuladen. Euer nachlässiges Denken lässt vermuten, {name}, und ich möchte fast darauf wetten, dass dieses Schicksal Euer Reich bereits erfasst hat."

languages.text: {n}Edelthrad, Theodora'nın kahkahasına katılıyor.{/n} "Yetkileri başkasına bırakmak, dizginsiz kâfirliği ve tehlikeli özgür düşünceyi saflarına davet etmekle eşdeğerdir. Lakayıt zihniyetine bakılırsa {name}, eminim ki mülkünün başına çoktan böyle bir akıbet gelmiştir."
languages.original_text: {n}Edelthrad echoes Theodora's laugh.{/n} "Relinquishing authority is tantamount to inviting rampant heresy and dangerous freethinking into your midst. Judging by your lackadaisical mindset, {name}, I would wager that such a fate has already befallen your domain."

languages.original_text: {n}Edelthrad echoes Theodora's laugh.{/n} "Relinquishing authority is tantamount to inviting rampant heresy and dangerous freethinking into your midst. Judging by your lackadaisical mindset, , I would wager that such a fate has already befallen your domain."
